a_blade_or_two_description: Perhaps you carry a simple fighting knife. Or two curved swords. Or a rapier and stiletto. Or a heavy butcher’s cleaver.
a_large_weapon_description: A weapon meant for two hands. A battle-axe, greatsword, warhammer, or pole-arm. A hunting rifle. A shotgun. A bow or crossbow.
a_handgun_description: A 1911 Handgun with 10 rounds, notorious for missing 9/10 shots
an_unusual_weapon_description: A curiosity or tool turned into a weapon. A whip, a flail, a hatchet, a shovel, a length of chain, a razor-edged fan, steel-toed boots.
arcane_implements_description: A vial of quicksilver. A pouch of black salt. A spirit anchor in the form of a small stone. A clove of garlic. A bundle of sage. A stick of chalk.
armor_description: A thick leather tunic plus reinforced gloves and boots.
attune_description: Attune to spirits and the ghost field; channel electroplasmic energy; perceive and communicate with ghosts; understand spectrology.

climbing_gear_description: A large coil of rope. A small coil of rope. Grappling hooks. A small pouch of chalk dust. A climbing harness with loops and metal rings. A set of iron pitons and a small mallet.
command_description: Command obedience with your force of personality; intimidate or threaten; lead an action with one of the crew's gangs.
consort_description: Consort with connections from your sign, outlook, friends, or rivals to gain access to resources, information, people, or places.
crew_ability_accord_description: Sometimes friends are as good as territory. You may count up to three +3 faction statuses you hold as if they are turf.
crew_ability_all_hands_description: During downtime, one of your cohorts may perform a downtime activity for the crew to acquire an asset, reduce heat, or work on a long-term project.
crew_ability_anointed_description: You get +1d to resistance rolls against supernatural threats. You get +1d to healing rolls when you have supernatural harm.
crew_ability_as_one_description: When you do violence or perform a ritual alongside your cohorts, they get +1d for teamwork rolls.
crew_ability_as_good_as_your_word_descri: You may spend rep as coin in downtime actions. Vigilantes gain Obligation as a second vice.
crew_ability_avengers_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Hunt, Prowl, or Command (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_blood_brothers_description: When you fight alongside your cohorts in combat, they get +1d for teamwork rolls (setup and group actions). All of your cohorts get the thugs type for free (if they're already thugs, add another type).
crew_ability_bound_in_darkness_descripti: You may use teamwork with any cult member, regardless of the distance separating you. By taking 1 stress, your weirded message is heard by every cultist.
crew_ability_chosen_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Attune, Study, or Sway (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_community_description: Each PC gains the vice Companionship. You cannot overindulge with this vice.
crew_ability_conviction_description: Each PC gains an additional Vice: Worship. When you indulge this vice and bring a pleasing sacrifice, you don't overindulge if you clear excess stress. In addition, your deity will assist any one action roll you make — from now until you indulge this vice again.
crew_ability_crow's_veil_description: Due to hard-won experience or occult ritual, your activities are hidden from the notice of the death-seeker crows. You don't take extra heat when killing is involved on a score.
crew_ability_dangerous_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Hunt, Skirmish, or Wreck (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_dark_clientele_description: Through arcane ritual or hard-won experience, you have discovered how to prepare your product for sale to ghosts and/or demons. They do not pay in coin.
crew_ability_deadly_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Hunt, Prowl, or Skirmish (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_deadly_focus_description: When you set out to murder one of your Claim targets, take +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_discerning_customers_descri: When you acquire an asset, take +1d.
crew_ability_door_kickers_description: When you execute an assault plan, take +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_emberdeath_description: Due to hard-won experience or occult ritual, you know the arcane method to destroy a living victim's spirit at the moment you kill them. Take 3 stress to channel electroplasmic energy from the ghost field to disintegrate the spirit and dead body in a shower of sparking embers.
crew_ability_everyone_steals_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Prowl, Finesse, or Tinker (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_exquisite_delights_descript: Your produce is exquisite. The product quality is equal to your Tier +2. When you deal with a crew or faction, the GM will tell you who among them indulges in the pleasures of your product (one, a few, many, or all).
crew_ability_favors_description: Spend one rep and describe how one of your contacts is put out to help you. Everyone in your crew gets one dot in an action your contact is skilled in for this score.
crew_ability_fiends_description: Fear is as good as respect. You may count each wanted level as if it was turf.
crew_ability_fight_with_tools_descriptio: When you acquire assets, increase their quality by 1.
crew_ability_forged_in_the_fire_descript: Each PC has been toughened by cruel experience. You get +1d to resistance rolls.
crew_ability_ghost_echoes_description: From weird experience or occult ritual, all crew members gain the ability to see and interact with the ghostly structures, streets, and objects within the echo of Doskvol that exists in the ghost field.
crew_ability_ghost_market_description: Through arcane ritual or hard-won experience, you have discovered how to prepare your product for sale to ghosts and/or demons. They do not pay in coin. What do they pay with?
crew_ability_ghost_passage_description: From harsh experience or occult ritual, all crew members become immune to possession by spirits, but may choose to "carry" a second ghost as a passenger within their body.
crew_ability_glory_incarnate_description: Your deity sometimes manifests in the physical world. This can be a great boon, but the priorities and values of a god are not those of mortals. You have been warned.
crew_ability_high_society_description: It's all about who you know. Take -1 heat during downtime and +1d to gather info about the city's elite.
crew_ability_hooked_description: Your gang members use your product. Add the savage, unreliable, or wild flaw to your gangs to give them +1 quality.
crew_ability_hungry_friends_description: You have a deal with the demons of the rivers and wilds. Bodies dumped into their domains simply disappear. If there are no other witnesses, you don’t take extra heat when killing is involved on a score and the bodies are disposed of in this way.
crew_ability_just_passing_through_descri: During downtime, take -1 heat. When your heat is 4 or less, you get +1d to deceive people when you pass yourselves off as ordinary citizens.
crew_ability_leverage_description: Your crew supplies contraband for other factions. Your success is good for them. Whenever you gain rep, gain +1 rep.
crew_ability_like_part_of_the_family_des: Create one of your vehicles as a cohort (use the vehicle edges and flaws, below). Its quality is equal to your Tier +1.
crew_ability_locals_description: During downtime, take -1 heat. When your heat is 4 or less, you get +1d to pass yourselves off as ordinary citizens.
crew_ability_mere_magic_description: Crew can mark Special armor to increase the effect of a Prowl or Finesse action when performing sleight of hand.
crew_ability_misdirection_description: At the end of a score, you may sacrifice half the rep gained to make another faction lose status with your target instead of your crew. How do you pin it on someone else?
crew_ability_moral_compass_description: Each PC gains an additional xp trigger: You fulfilled an obligation at a cost to you or the crew.
crew_ability_no_traces_description: When you keep an operation quiet or make it look like an accident, you get half the rep value of the target (round up) instead of zero. When you end downtime with zero heat, take +1 rep.
crew_ability_nobodies_description: Take -1 heat during downtime. You get +1d to deceive people when you pass yourselves off as servants or labourers.
crew_ability_pack_rats_description: Your lair is a jumble of stolen items. When you roll to acquire an asset, take +1d.
crew_ability_patron_description: When you advance your Tier, it costs half the coin it normally would. Who is your patron? Why do they help you?
crew_ability_persuasive_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Command, Consort, or Sway (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_predators_description: When you use stealth or subterfuge to commit murder, take +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_professional_drunks_descrip: +1d on resistance rolls against poison and intoxication and to Study, Sway, or Consort with an intoxicated target.
crew_ability_reavers_description: When you go into conflict aboard a vehicle, you gain +1 effect for vehicle damage and speed. Your vehicle gains armor.
crew_ability_red_wave_description: Fear is as good as respect. Every three names you cross off the river of names counts as 1 turn.
crew_ability_renegades_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Finesse, Prowl, or Skirmish (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_ritual_of_bleeding_descript: Each PC gains an additional vice: Bleeding. This vice is indulged at your farm in secret and you take minor harm when you do so. One cohort may be present for the ritual and gains +1 quality (max rating of 4) until the start of the next downtime.
crew_ability_roots_description: During downtime one of your contacts or cohorts may take a downtime action to acquire an asset, reduce heat, or recover.
crew_ability_saboteurs_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Prowl, Wreck, or Hunt (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_sealed_in_blood_description: Each human sacrifice yields -3 stress cost for any ritual you perform.
crew_ability_second_story_description: When you execute a clandestine infiltration, you get +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_thieves_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Finesse, Prowl, or Sway (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_silver_tongues_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Command, Consort, or Sway (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_slippery_description: When you roll entanglements, roll twice and keep the one you want. When you reduce heat on the crew, take +1d.
crew_ability_synchronized_description: When you perform a group action, you may count multiple 6s from different rolls as a critical success.
crew_ability_the_good_stuff_description: Your merchandise is exquisite. The product quality is equal to your Tier+2. When you deal with a crew or faction, the GM will tell you who among them is hooked on your product (one, a few, many, or all).
crew_ability_thorn_in_your_side_descript: When you use Stealth or Assault plans against a higher Tier faction, your Tier counts as +1.
crew_ability_together_we_rise_descriptio: When you make a group action, the effect level is increased.
crew_ability_troupe_performance_descript: When creating a distraction, if you lead a group action or receive assistance, take an additional +1d.
crew_ability_uncanny_preparation_descrip: Twice per session during a Desperate action, improve your effect or position. Describe a flashback that gives you the advantage now (setup action).
crew_ability_veteran_description: Choose a special ability from another crew (can be taken more than once).
crew_ability_vipers_description: When you acquire or craft poisons, you get +1 result level to your roll. When you employ a poison, you are specially prepared to be immune to its effects.
crew_ability_war_dogs_description: When you’re at war (-3 faction status), your crew does not suffer -1 hold and PCs still get two downtime activities, instead of just one.
crew_ability_zealotry_description: Your cohorts have abandoned their reason to devote themselves to the cult. They will undertake any service, no matter how dangerous or strange. They gain +1d to rolls against enemies of the faith.
crew_assassins_xp_condition: Execute a successful accident, disappearance, murder, or ransom operation.
crew_thugs_xp_condition: Execute a successful battle, extortion, sabotage, or smash & grab operation.
crew_cult_xp_condition: Advance the agenda of your deity or embody its precepts in action.
crew_emcees_xp_condition: Rise in social standing or notoriety.
crew_hawkers_hunting_grounds_description: Sale — Supply — Show of Force — Socialize
crew_hawkers_xp_condition: Acquire product supply, execute clandestine/covert sales, or secure new territory.
crew_river_xp_condition: Execute a successful foment, murder, or overthrow operation.
crew_roots_hunting_grounds_description: Acquisition — Sale — Show of Force — Farm Work
crew_roots_xp_condition: Row your farm, execute clandestine or covert sales, or secure new buyers.
crew_thieves_xp_condition: Execute a successful  burglary, espionage, robbery, or sabotage operation.
crew_couriers_xp_condition: Execute a successful smuggling or acquire new clients or contraband sources.

documents_description: A collection of slim volumes on a variety of topics, including a registry of marriages, police officers, and other notable citizens. Blank pages, a pen. A number of interesting maps.

sign_info: The Moons — The Eye — The Scales — The Tree — The Bone — The Stone
hull_viceblurb: Your clockwork body runs on electroplasm. Recharge your capacitors by connecting to an industrial-grade generator (downtime action). When you do this, clear 5 drain.
hunt_description: Hunt a target; gather information about its location and movements; attack with precision shooting from a distance.
insight_description: Resist consequences from deception or understanding.
torch_description: A simple torch, a fancy head lamp, or other light source.

name: Name
planningdesc: Choose a plan, provide the detail. Choose your load limit for the operation.
archetype_ability_a_little_something_on_: At the end of each downtime phase, you earn +2 stash.
A Little Something on the Side
archetype_ability_a_void_in_the_echo_des: You are invisible to spirits and may not be harmed by them. Take 2 stress to cause living things to avert their gaze and fail to observe you for a few moments.
archetype_ability_alchemist_description: When you invent or craft a creation with alchemical features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special formula already known.
archetype_ability_ambitious_description: You gain an additional xp trigger: You defended your turf or tried to expand it. If your crew followed your lead, also mark crew xp.
archetype_ability_ambush_description: When you attack from hiding or spring a trap, you get +1d.
archetype_ability_analyst_description: During downtime, you get two ticks to distribute among any long term project clocks that involve investigation or learning a new formula or design plan.
archetype_ability_arcane_sight_descripti: Take 1 stress to sense beyond human limits. "Hear" a subject's true thoughts or feelings, see in pitch darkness, sense the presence of invisible things, intuit the location of a hidden object, etc.
archetype_ability_artificer_description: When you invent or craft a creation with spark-craft features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special design already known.
archetype_ability_automaton_description: You are a spirit animating a clockwork body. You have human-like strength and senses, by default. Your hull has natural armor (this doesn't count for your load). Your former human feelings, interests, and connections are only dim memories. You now exist to fulfill your functions. Choose three. You may be rebuilt if damaged or destroyed. If your soul vessel is shattered, you are freed from servitude and become a Ghost. Whenever you would take stress, take drain instead.
archetype_ability_battleborn_description: You may expend your special armor to reduce harm from an attack in combat or to push yourself during a fight.
archetype_ability_bodyguard_description: When you protect a teammate, take +1d to your resistance roll. When you gather info to anticipate possible threats in the current situation, you get +1 effect.
archetype_ability_calculating_descriptio: Due to your careful planning, during downtime, you may give yourself or another crew member +1 downtime action.
archetype_ability_cloak_&_dagger_descrip: When you use a disguise or other form of covert misdirection, you get +1d to rolls to confuse or deflect suspicion. When you throw off your disguise, the resulting surprise gives you the initiative in the situation.
archetype_ability_compartments_descripti: Your items are built-in to your frame and may recess beneath panels out of sight. Your frame can now carry +2 load.
archetype_ability_compel_description: You can Attune to the ghost field to force a nearby ghost to appear and obey a command you give it. You are not supernaturally terrified by a ghost you summon or compel (though your allies may be).
archetype_ability_connected_description: During downtime, you get +1 result level when you acquire an asset or reduce heat.
archetype_ability_cut-out_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from suspicion or persuasion, or to push yourself when acting on someone else’s behalf.
archetype_ability_daredevil_description: When you roll a desperate action, you get +1d to your roll if you also take -1d to any resistance rolls against consequences from your action.
archetype_ability_dark_talent_descriptio: Choose Insight, Prowess, or Resolve. Your max rating for actions under that attribute becomes 5. When you take this ability, add +1 dot to the resistance rating of the attribute you've chosen.
archetype_ability_dissipate_description: You can disperse the electroplasmic vapor of your ghostly form in order to pass through solid objects for a moment. Take 1 drain when you dissipate, plus 1 drain for each feature: It lasts longer (a minute — an hour — a day) — you also become invisible — anything that passes through your form becomes dangerously electrified or frozen.
archetype_ability_driven_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of fatigue, weakness, or chemical effects, or to push yourself when wreaking havoc and destruction.
archetype_ability_electroplasmic_project: You may release some of your plasmic energy as an electrical shock around you or as a directed beam. You may also use this ability to create a lightning barrier to repel or trap a spirit. Take 1 drain for each level of magnitude.
archetype_ability_expertise_description: Choose one of your action ratings. When you lead a group action using that action, you can suffer only 1 stress at most regardless of the number of failed rolls.
archetype_ability_eye_for_weakness_descr: When you gather information about someone’s vulnerabilities, you get +1 effect. If you use this information to help plan a score, you also get +1d to the engagement roll for that operation.
archetype_ability_focused_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of surprise or mental harm (fear, confusion, losing track of someone) or to push yourself for ranged combat or tracking.
archetype_ability_foresight_description: Two times per score you can assist a teammate without paying stress. Tell us how you prepared for this.
archetype_ability_fortitude_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of fatigue, weakness, or chemical effects, or to push yourself when working with technical skill or handling chemicals.
archetype_ability_fortune_teller_descrip: You may Attune to a nearby person’s thoughts, in order to “hear” them yourself.
archetype_ability_frame_upgrade_descript: Choose an additional frame feature. This upgrade may be taken up to four times.
archetype_ability_functioning_vice_descr: When you indulge your vice, you may adjust the dice outcome by 1 or 2 (up or down). An ally who joins in your vice may do the same.
archetype_ability_ghost_contract_descrip: When you shake on a deal, you and your partner — human or otherwise — both bear a mark of your oath. If either breaks the contract, they take level 3 harm, "Cursed".
archetype_ability_ghost_fighter_descript: You may imbue your hands, melee weapons, or tools with spirit energy. You gain potency in combat vs. the supernatural. You may grapple with spirits to restrain and capture them.
archetype_ability_ghost_form_description: You are now a concentration of electroplasmic vapor which resembles your living body and clothes. You may weakly interact with the physical world and vice versa. You're vulnerable to arcane powers and electroplasmic effects. You move about by floating and may fly swiftly without tiring. You may slowly flow through small openings as a vapor. You chill the area around you and are terrifying for the living to behold. You are affected by lucky charms (take 2 drain to overcome the repulsion). Whenever you would take stress, take drain instead. When you would take trauma, take gloom instead.
archetype_ability_ghost_friend_descripti: Through some arcane means, you are able to interact, physically and socially, with some supernatural beings as if they were normal humans. Choose one type: demons—forgotten gods—ghosts and spirits—hulls—vampires. Take this ability again to choose an additional type of being.
archetype_ability_ghost_hunter_descripti: Your hunting pet is imbued with spirit energy. It gains potency when tracking or fighting the supernatural, and gains an arcane ability: ghost-form, mind-link, or arrow-swift. Take this ability again to choose an additional arcane ability for your pet.
archetype_ability_ghost_image_descriptio: You may create an illusion, which affects one sense (sight, hearing, smell, etc) for as long as you concentrate. Take 1 stress when it manifests, plus 1 stress for each additional feature: it can affect multiple senses—it can move—it last for several minutes after you stop concentrating.
archetype_ability_ghost_in_the_machine_d: You can make inanimate objects move on their own, as if possessed by a ghost. Take 1 stress to do so, plus 1 stress for each extra feature: The objects function as a weapon—you break or damage something—you cause numerous objects to move.
archetype_ability_ghost_legion_descripti: Your entourage gains potency when fighting the supernatural or defending you from it, and an arcane ability: they can capture ghosts, they can survive in the deathlands, or you can possess their bodies from afar. Take this ability again to choose an additional arcane ability for your entourage.
archetype_ability_ghost_mind_description: You’re always aware of supernatural entities in your presence. Take +1d when you gather info about the supernatural.
archetype_ability_ghost_veil_description: You may shift partially into the ghost field, becoming shadowy and insubstantial for a few moments. Take 2 stress when you shift, plus 1 stress for each extra feature: It lasts for a few minutes rather than moments — you are invisible rather than shadowy — you may float through the air like a ghost
archetype_ability_ghost_voice_descriptio: You know the secret method to interact with a ghost or demon as if it was a normal human, regardless of how wild or feral it appears. You gain potency when communicating with the supernatural.
archetype_ability_ghost_ward_description: You know how to Wreck an area with arcane substances and methods so it is either anathema or enticing to spirits (your choice).
archetype_ability_ghoul_description: You are able to consume any organic material, no matter how disgusting, as if it were food. You may devour an entire human body, and you are immune to poisons produced by plants and animals that are not arcane.
archetype_ability_hypnotic_description: You can push yourself to do one one of the following: paralyze someone you make eye contact with—plant a hypnotic command in someone’s mind, that they will obey at some later time.
archetype_ability_infiltrator_descriptio: You are not affected by quality or Tier when you bypass security measures.
archetype_ability_interface_description: You may attune to the local electroplasmic power field to control it or something connected to it (including another hull).
archetype_ability_iron_will_description: You're immune to the terror that some supernatural entities inflict on sight. Take +1d to resistance rolls with Resolve.
archetype_ability_jail_bird_description: When incarcerated, your wanted level counts as 1 less, your Tier as 1 more, and you gain +1 faction status with a faction you help on the inside (in addition to your incarceration roll).
archetype_ability_leader_description: When you Command a cohort in combat, they continue to fight when they would otherwise break (they're not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain +1 effect and 1 armor.
archetype_ability_like_a_star_descriptio: You can push yourself to do one of the following: levitate or float through the air like a ghost—produce a light from nothing (either brilliant and blinding or dim and long-lasting, your choice).
archetype_ability_like_looking_into_a_mi: You can always tell when someone is lying to you.
archetype_ability_lost_&_found_descripti: You may hide 1 item upon your person in such a way that it cannot be found until you produce it. It does not count against your load.
archetype_ability_machinist_description: You may expend your special armor to reduce harm caused by weapons, machinery, or devices, or to push yourself when using a gadget or other piece of technology.
archetype_ability_manifest_description: Take 1 drain to flow through the electroplasmic pathways of the ghost field in order to instantly travel to any place you knew intimately in life, or to answer the summoning call of a compel.
archetype_ability_mastermind_description: You may expend your special armor to protect a teammate, or to push yourself when you gather information or work on a long-term project.
archetype_ability_mesmerism_description: When you Sway someone, you may cause them to forget that it's happened until they next interact with you.
archetype_ability_misdirection_descripti: When you create a distraction, you get +1d.
archetype_ability_monstrous_description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of athletics that verges on the superhuman—take on the appearance of a frightening monster.
archetype_ability_mule_description: Your load limits are higher. Light: 5. Normal: 7. Heavy: 8.
archetype_ability_not_to_be_trifled_with: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of physical force that verges on the superhuman — engage a small gang on equal footing in close combat.
archetype_ability_occultist_description: You know the secret ways to Consort with ancient powers, forgotten gods or demons. Once you've consorted with one, you get +1d to command cultists who worship it.
archetype_ability_overcharge_description: Take 1 drain to perform a feat of extreme strength or speed (run faster than a horse, rend metal with bare hands, etc.). This factors into effect.
archetype_ability_physicker_description: You can Tinker with bones, blood, and bodily humours to treat wounds or stabilize the dying. You may study a malady or corpse. Everyone in your crew gets +1d to their healing treatment rolls.
archetype_ability_poltergeist_descriptio: Take 1 drain to strongly interact with the physical world for a few moments (as if you had a normal body). Extend the reach and magnitude of your interaction to include telekinetic force and electroplasmic discharges by taking more drain (2-6).
archetype_ability_possess_description: You may attune to the ghost field in order to take control of a living body. When your control is challenged, you must re-attune (risking electroplasmic harm) or leave the body. Your control is challenged when: you consume spirit energy from the host — when arcane powers act against you — when the host's will is driven to desperation. You may easily and indefinitely possess a hull or hollow which has been ritually prepared for you (change your archetype to Hull or Vampire, respectively).
archetype_ability_practiced_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from detection or security measures, or to push yourself while dealing with the arcane.
archetype_ability_theatreared_descriptio: You may expend your special armor to resist consequences suffered during a flashback, or to push yourself when you gather information or work on a long-term project.
archetype_ability_pyromancer_description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: produce a cloud of smoke or unleash a gout of flame as a weapon—drastically raise or lower the temperature of your immediate vicinity.
archetype_ability_red_right_hand_descrip: When you assist a teammate, you can choose to take 2 stress instead of only 1, and they get +1 effect, as well as +1d.
archetype_ability_reflexes_description: When there's a question about who acts first, the answer is you (two characters with Reflexes act simultaneously).
archetype_ability_revolutionary_descript: You gain an additional xp trigger: You attacked the government or the nobility. If your crew attacked them too, also mark crew xp.
archetype_ability_ritual_description: You can Study an occult ritual (or create a new one) to summon a supernatural effect or being. You know the arcane methods to perform ritual sorcery. You begin with one ritual already learned.
archetype_ability_rook's_gambit_descript: Take 2 stress to roll your best action rating while performing a different action. Say how you adapt your skill to this use.
archetype_ability_saboteur_description: When you Wreck, the work is much quieter than it should be and the damage is hidden from casual inspection.
archetype_ability_savage_description: When you unleash physical violence, it's especially frightening. When you Command a frightened target, take +1d.
archetype_ability_scout_description: When you gather info to locate a target, you get +1 effect. When you hide in a prepared position or use camouflage, you get +1d to rolls to avoid detection.
archetype_ability_secondary_hull_descrip: Choose an additional frame and its starting feature. You may transfer your consciousness between your frames at will.
archetype_ability_security_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of surprise or mental harm (fear, confusion, losing track of someone) or to push yourself when guarding a teammate.
archetype_ability_sending_a_message_desc: When you speak for a teammate or stand before them while they talk, you can help them Command or Sway without gaining stress.
archetype_ability_shadow_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from detection or security measures, or to push yourself for a feat of athletics or stealth.
archetype_ability_sharpshooter_descripti: You can push yourself to do one of the following: make a ranged attack at extreme distance beyond what’s normal for the weapon — unleash a barrage of rapid fire to suppress the enemy.
archetype_ability_sinister_guile_descrip: During downtime, choose one: Get a free additional downtime activity, or take +1d to all downtime activity rolls.
archetype_ability_snake_charmer_descript: As long as you perform before a crowd, it is unable to be dispersed, and one person you name, in particular, is too transfixed to leave.
archetype_ability_strange_methods_descri: When you invent or craft a creation with arcane features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one arcane design already known.
archetype_ability_strategic_retreat_desc: You can push yourself to do one of the following: break the enemy’s ranks with a charge or a barrage of suppressive fire—pull someone you can touch to freedom.
archetype_ability_subterfuge_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from suspicion or persuasion, or to push yourself for subterfuge.
archetype_ability_subterfuge_rakshasa_de: You may expend your special armor to resist a supernatural consequence, or to push yourself for a feat of athletics or stealth.
archetype_ability_survivor_description: From hard won experience or occult ritual, you are immune to the poisonous miasma of the deathlands and are able to subsist on the strange flora and fauna there. You get +1 stress box.
archetype_ability_tempest_description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: unleash a stroke of lightning as a weapon — summon a storm in your immediate vicinity (torrential rain, roaring winds, heavy fog, chilling frost/snow, etc.).
archetype_ability_terrible_power_descrip: Take 1 stress to perform a feat of superhuman strength or speed (run faster than a carriage, break stone with bare hands, leap onto the roof of a building, etc.). This factors into effect.
archetype_ability_the_black_speech_descr: Through blessings, enchantments, or spells, you may communicate with animals just as easily as you can with humans, even the wildest of deathlands creatures.
archetype_ability_the_devil's_footsteps_: When you push yourself, choose one of the following additional benefits: perform a feat of athletics that verges on the superhuman — maneuver to confuse your enemies so they mistakenly attack each other.
archetype_ability_the_tiger's_fury_descr: You can push yourself to do one of the following: move to any location on the field of battle that you can see—push violently against your enemies, knocking them back, down, or over.
archetype_ability_tough_as_nails_descrip: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal).
archetype_ability_trust_in_me_descriptio: You get +1d vs. a target with whom you have an intimate relationship.
archetype_ability_undead_description: You are a spirit which animates an undead body. Your trauma is maxed out. Choose four trauma conditions which reflect your vampiric nature. Arcane attacks are potent against you. If you suffer fatal harm or trauma, your undead spirit is overwhelmed. You take level 3 harm: "Incapacitated" until you feed enough to recover. If you suffer arcane harm while in this state, you are destroyed utterly. Your XP tracks are longer (you now advance more slowly). You have more stress boxes.
archetype_ability_underworld_contacts_de: When you acquire an asset that is restricted, such as chemicals, bombs, and other illegal materials, you get +1 result level to your roll, and you never attract additional heat for doing so.
archetype_ability_vengeful_description: You gain an additional xp trigger: You got payback against someone who harmed you or someone you care about. If your crew helped you get payback, also mark crew xp.
archetype_ability_venomous_description: Choose a drug or poison (from your bandolier stock) to which you have become immune. You can push yourself to secrete it through your skin or saliva or exhale it as a vapor.
archetype_ability_veteran_description: Choose a special ability from another source (can be taken more than once).
archetype_ability_vigorous_description: You recover from harm faster. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. Take +1d to healing treatment rolls.
archetype_ability_warded_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a supernatural consequence, or to push yourself when you deal with arcane forces.
archetype_ability_weaving_the_web_descri: You gain +1d to Consort when you gather information on a target for a score. You get +1d to the engagement roll for that operation.
archetype_jock_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with violence or coercion.
archetype_faris_description: A fearsome warlord, a sultan of the streets
archetype_faris_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with a show of force or leadership.
archetype_forger_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with technical skills or devices.
archetype_ghost_xp_condition: You exacted vengeance upon those whom you deem deserving.
archetype_ghost_xp_condition2: You expressed your outrage or anger, or settled scores from your sign or outlook.
archetype_ghost_xp_condition3: You struggled with issues from your need or glooms during the session.
archetype_hick_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with tracking or violence.
archetype_hull_description: A spirit animating a clockwork frame
archetype_hull_xp_condition: You fulfilled your functions despite difficulty or danger.
archetype_hull_xp_condition2: You suppressed or ignored your former human beliefs, drives, sign, or outlook.
archetype_hull_xp_condition3: You struggled with issues from your wear during the session.
archetype_janissary_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with courage or attention to detail.
archetype_nerd_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with technical skill or mayhem.
archetype_goth_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with stealth or evasion.
archetype_mirage_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with deception or showmanship.
archetype_rafiq_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with subterfuge or influence.
archetype_rakshasa_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with stealth or violence.
archetype_theatre_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with deception or influence.
archetype_prep_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with calculation or conspiracy.
archetype_vampire_description: A spirit animating an undead body
archetype_vampire_xp_condition: You displayed your dominance or slayed without mercy.
archetype_vampire_xp_condition2: You expressed your beliefs, drives, sign, or outlook.
archetype_vampire_xp_condition3: You struggled with issues from your vice, traumas, or strictures during the session.
archetype_vizier_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with planning or teamwork.
archetype_weird_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with knowledge or arcane power.
archetype_zindiq_description: A rebellious student of heretical science
archetype_zindiq_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with rhetoric or destruction.
prowess_description: Resist consequences from physical strain or injury.
prowl_description: Prowl about unseen and traverse obstacles; climb, swim, run, jump, and tumble. Ambush with close violence — a backstab, throat cutting, black-jack, etc.
query_for_consequence: Query for consequence name when resisting
recoveryblurb: Get treatment in downtime to activate your healing project clock
resist_instructions: Suffer 6 stress minus the highest die result. When you roll a critical on resistance, clear 1 stress.
resolve_description: Resist consequences from mental strain or willpower.
roots_plot_addiction_benefit: Roll twice when indulging vice, choose preferred
roots_plot_beautiful_dish_benefit: +1d to Sway when entrancing or deceiving
roots_plot_filling_portion_benefit: Each PC may carry up to 6 coin on their person
roots_plot_luxury_sacrifice: One Who Was Born into Wealth
roots_plot_morish_delight_benefit: Roll twice for entanglements, choose preferred
roots_plot_religious_meal_benefit: +1d to reduce heat with religious contacts
roots_plot_staple_benefit: +1d to resistance rolls to endure exhaustion
show_broadcast: Show broadcast buttons for sending information to chat
show_cohort_section: Show cohort section on character sheet
show_outline: Show outline for active input fields
skirmish_description: Skirmish with an opponent in close combat; assault or hold a position; brawl and wrestle.
strictures_bestial: When you suffer physical harm or overindulge your vice, your body twists into a horrific bestial form until you next feed without overindulging.
strictures_bound: Your spirit must remain in this body, or be destroyed.
strictures_forbidden: You cannot enter a private residence without permission from the owner.
strictures_repelled: Lucky charms can hold you at bay. (Take 2 stress to resist the repulsion.)
strictures_slumber: In downtime, you must spend one activity resting in a dark, silent place (or else suffer 3 stress).
stricturesblurb: When you gain a new vampire trait (except veteran), add a stricture.
study_description: Study a person, document, or item with close scrutiny to gather information and apply knowledge; gain a deeper understanding; do research.
subterfuge_supplies_description: A theatrical make-up kit. A selection of blank documents, ready for the forger's hand. Costume jewelry. A reversible cloak and distinctive hat. A forged badge of office.
survey_description: Survey a location or situation to understand what's going on; sense trouble before it happens; gather information about opportunities or exploits.
sway_description: Sway someone with charm, logic, deception, disguise, or bluff; change attitudes or behavior with manipulation or seduction.
tinker_description: Tinker with mechanisms to create, modify, disable, or repair; disable a trap, pick a lock, or crack a safe. Use the ubiquitous clockwork and electroplasmic devices around the city to your advantage.
tinkering_tools_description: An assortment for detailed mechanist work: jeweler’s loupe, tweezers, a small hammer, pliers, screwdriver, etc.
upgrade_boat_description: You have a boat, a dock on a waterway, and a small shack to store boating supplies. A second upgrade improves the boat with armor and more cargo capacity.
upgrade_carriage_description: You have a carriage, two goats to pull it, and a stable. A second upgrade improves the carriage with armor and larger, swifter goats. Horses are very rare in Doskvol — most carriages in the city use the large Akorosian goat as their draft animal.
upgrade_gear_description: +1 quality for Burglary Gear and Climbing Gear.
upgrade_hidden_description: Your lair has a secret location and is disguised to hide it from view. If your lair is discovered, use two downtime activities and pay coin equal to your Tier to relocate it and hide it once again.
upgrade_insight_description: Earn 2 xp when training insight during downtime.
upgrade_mastery_description: Your crew has access to master level training. You may advance your PCs' action ratings to 4 (until you unlock this upgrade, PC action ratings are capped at 3). This costs four upgrade boxes to unlock.
upgrade_personal_description: Earn 2 xp when training archetype during downtime.
upgrade_prowess_description: Earn 2 xp when training prowess during downtime.
upgrade_quarters_description: Your lair includes living quarters for the crew. Without this upgrade, each PC sleeps elsewhere, and is vulnerable when they do so.
upgrade_resolve_description: Earn 2 xp when training resolve during downtime.
upgrade_secure_description: Your lair has locks, alarms, and traps to thwart intruders. A second upgrade improves the defenses to include arcane measures that work against spirits. You might roll your crew's Tier if these measures are ever put to the test, to see how well they thwart an intruder.
upgrade_tools_description: +1 quality for Demolition Tools and Tinkering Tools.
upgrade_vault_description: Your lair has a secure vault, increasing your storage capacity for coin to 8. A second upgrade increases your capacity to 16. A separate part of your vault can be used as a holding cell.
upgrade_workshop_description: Your lair has a workshop appointed with tools for tinkering and alchemy, as well as a small library of books, documents, and maps. You may accomplish long-term projects with these assets without leaving your lair.
upon_crew_advance: Upon crew advance, each PC gets Stash = Tier+2
use_kirsty: Use Kirsty font if installed (only check if you have Kirsty)
vampire_viceblurb: Your vice is life essence, consumed from a living human. Use 1 downtime activity to hunt prey and indulge your vice. Also, when you feed, erase all level 1 harm and mark 4 ticks on your healing clock. This is is the only way you can heal. How do you feed? What telltale sign do you leave on your victims?
vehicle_edges_flaws:
Vehicle Edges
Nimble: The vehicle handles easily. Consider this an assist for tricky maneuvers.
Simple: The vehicle is easy to repair. Remove all of its harm during downtime.
Sturdy: The vehicle keeps operating even when broken.

Vehicle Flaws
Costly: Thee vehicle costs 1 coin per downtime to keep in operation.
Distinct: Thee vehicle has memorable features. Take +1 heat when you use it on a score.
Finicky: The vehicle has quirks that only one person understands. When operated without them, the vehicle has -1 quality.
vice_info: Faith — Gambling — Luxury — Obligation — Pleasure — Stupor — Weird
vice_instructions: Clear an amount of stress equal to the highest die result. If the result of your vice roll means you clear more stress levels than you had marked, you overindulge.
warblurb1: When you're at war with any number of factions (status -3), the following penalties apply:
warblurb2: Lose 1 hold (temporarily, while the war persists). This may knock you down a Tier.
warblurb3: PCs get only one free downtime action instead of two.
warblurb5: Your claims which generate coin (vice dens, fighting pits, fences, etc.) produce only half their normal income (round down).
when_you_use_bandolier: When you use a bandolier slot, choose an alchemical:
wreck_description: Wreck a place, item, or obstacle with savage force or carefully applied sabotage; breach defenses with force; create distractions and chaos.
xp_beliefs: You expressed your beliefs, drives, sign, or outlook.
xp_bolster: Bolster your crew's reputation or develop a new one.
xp_contend: Contend with challenges above your current station.
xp_crew_specific: Enter your crew's specific way to mark XP here.
xp_desperate: Every time you roll a desperate action, mark xp in that action's attribute.
xp_express: Express the goals, drives, inner conflict, or essential nature of the crew.
xp_specific_extra: Enter another specific way to mark XP here.
xp_specific: Enter your archetype's specific way to mark XP here.
xp_top: At the end of each session, for each item below, mark 1 xp (or instead mark 2 xp if that item occurred multiple times).
xp_vice: You struggled with issues from your vice or traumas during the session.
zerodice: Zero Dice — take the lowest result above
